name: Apple Pie Baked Oats
description: With each spoonful, you’ll savour the sweet, comforting flavours of apple pie while also getting a healthy dose of protein and fibre. One serving contains a whopping 7 grams of fibre, helping you reach your daily goal of 25-30 grams.
preparation: In a Round or Multipurpose Steamer, add milk, oats, and apple pie spice; stir until combined.
Top oat mixture with sliced apples and microwave, covered, for 4–6 min.
Portion into 4 bowls and top with 1⁄4 cup plain Greek yogurt, 1 tbsp sliced almonds, and 1 tsp maple syrup.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced meal.

products.name: Apple Pie Spice
summary: Move over pumpkin spice; it's time for Apple Pie Spice to shine! Perfect for leveling up the taste of fall-inspired baking, it's also great on top of oatmeal, in a frothy late or smoothie – or anywhere you want a punch of apple pie flavour.
